content: yip yips carissa browning carissaknits com any fan of late 20th century materials children s public television will bernat blanket/blanket brights/baby blanket 100% recognize these lovable aliens polyester 220yds/201m per 300g skein 1 skein in color of crochet or knit them use them your choice shown in royal blue pixie pink pow purple as holiday stockings toy storage baby teal crimson crochet and baby lilac knit kids laundry whatever really l/8mm crochet hook also used for attaching tentacles in yip yip yip yip uh-huh uh-huh… both crochet and knit versions us10 5/6 5mm circular needle 24 inches long finished measurements stitch marker circumference 25 inches tapestry needle height 14 inches excluding 2 ping pong balls tentacles & hanging loop black paint pen or permanent marker 2 pipe cleaners 12 inches long gauge awl ice pick corn pick for poking holes in ping pong balls 8 sts/8 row = 4 inches black flannel fabric 16 inches by 24 inches in single_crochet scissors 8 sts/16 row = 4 inches sewing needle in stockinette stitch black thread © 2018 carissa browning 1 abbreviations chain = chain k2tog = knit next 2 stitches together kfb = knit into front and back of next stitch rs = right side single_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet decrease = single_crochet decrease sl = slip next stitch as if to purl sm = slip marker st s = stitch es ws = wrong side wyib = with yarn in back wyif = with yarn in front notes the body begins at the bottom center and is worked in continuous rounds to the base of the mouth opening the sides of the mouth are worked back and forth in row the top of the head is finished in continuous rounds again then tentacles eyes and antennae are attached afterward followed by the lining © 2018 carissa browning 2 instructions crochet body make a slip knot round 1 6 single_crochet into slip knot place stitch marker on first st move marker up to first st of each new round as you work round 2 2 single_crochet into each st 12 sts round 3 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in following st to end 18 sts round 4 single_crochet in each of next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in following st to end 24 sts round 5 single_crochet in each of next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in following st to end 30 sts round 6 single_crochet in each of next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in following st to end 36 sts round 7 single_crochet in each of next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in following st to end 42 sts round 8 single_crochet in each of next 6 sts 2 single_crochet in following st to end 48 sts round 9 single_crochet into back loop of each st the tentacles will be attached to the front loops of this round round 10 single_crochet in each st repeat round 10 an additional 11 times or until body measures 8 inches from front loops of round 9
